00036 namespace base {
00037 
00038 class Universe;
00039 class VFileSystem;
00040 class Time;
00041 
00042 // singelton
00043 class Application : public Object
00044 {
00045 public:
00046   Application(const String& resourceDirectoryName, const String& cacheDirectoryName = "cache");
00047   virtual ~Application();
00048 
00049   virtual String className() const { return String("Application"); }
00050 
00051   static Application* getInstance() { return app; }
00052 
00053   ref<Universe>    universe() { return theUniverse; }
00054   ref<VFileSystem> filesystem() { return theFileSystem; }
00055 
00056 private:
00057   Application(const Application&)  {}
00058 
00059   ref<Universe>    theUniverse;
00060   ref<VFileSystem> theFileSystem;
00061   Time *theTime; // singleton
00062   
00063   static Application* app;  // the single instance
00064 };
